name: The Three Dancing Kids: Crushin' it
name_original: The Three Dancing Kids: Crushin' it
description:
"The Three Dancing Kids: Crushin' it" is the young adult entry in this series. This story follows Molly, the eldest dancing kid, after she earned first place in the Get-Up and Dance competition. Mother Goat introduced Bill Goat Jr., a new student, into the fold and instructed Molly to show him their routine for an up-and-coming dance competition.  

Everything is not what it seems, but Molly is smitten with this smooth operator, so she ignores the tall tell signs of Billy's ulterior motives before it's too late. 

Follow the story of Molly, Mae, and Millie on another adventure of the Three Dancing Kids.
